testcase.name: get call test
testcase.system-out: * def expected_response = read('response.json') ........................... passed Given url "https://reqres.in/api/users/2" ................................. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed Then print response ....................................................... passed And match response == expected_response ................................... passed And match response.data.id == 2 ........................................... passed And match response.data.last_name != null ................................. passed * match response.data.job_code == '#notpresent' ........................... passed
